short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change appearance of rendered content based on URL. Created primarily for ServiceNow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Site identifier is primarily for developers of ServiceNow or for that matter any tool that has multiple environments. It helps in putting a name to right side overlay. Another overlay to mark site background based on what colour user selects.

Extension also allows to store the frequently used scripts and any notes/todo for easier access.

Select dark colours as extension gets lighter shade and use it for overlay.

I am in the process of learning chrome extensions and seen few other extensions as well as took help from ChatGPT. But I needed something very simple so created this extension. I hope it helps others as well.
